html:
2025-0576
2025-07-25PMOOfficial Languages ActAppointment of the Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada on an interim basisAppointment of Raymond Théberge of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada on an interim basis, to hold office for a term of six months or until such time as a Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective July 29, 2025.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada on an interim basis
precis: Appointment of Raymond Théberge of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada on an interim basis, to hold office for a term of six months or until such time as a Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective July 29, 2025.
